Case# DateFormatter.Style.none

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
case none
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/DateFormatter/Style/none#Discussion)

Specifies no style.

Equal to `kCFDateFormatterNoStyle`.
